name: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
desc: Allowed uses for the encryption key in a certificate.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Initializes a trust settings key usage structure.

items.name: static var useSignature: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
items.desc: The key can be used to sign data or verify a signature.

items.name: static var useEnDecryptData: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
items.desc: The key can be used to encrypt or decrypt data.

items.name: static var useEnDecryptKey: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
items.desc: The key can be used to encrypt or decrypt (wrap or unwrap) a key.

items.name: static var useSignCert: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
items.desc: The key can be used to sign a certificate or verify a signature.

items.name: static var useSignRevocation: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
items.desc: The key can be used to sign an OCSP (online certificate status protocol) message or CRL (certificate verification list), or to verify a signature.

items.name: static var useKeyExchange: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
items.desc: The key is a private key that has been shared using a key exchange protocol, such as Diffie-Hellman key exchange.

items.name: static var useAny: SecTrustSettingsKeyUsage
items.desc: The key can be used for any purpose.
